original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 842: Will the Real JQ Please Stand Up
original_content:
Were back! This week Jonathan chats with Mattias Wadman and Michael Farber about JQ! Its more than just a JSON parser, JQ is a whole scripting language! Tune in to find out more about it.


https://jqlang.github.io/jq/manual/
https://play.jqlang.org/
https://github.com/wader/jqjq
https://github.com/wader/fq
https://github.com/01mf02/jaq
https://github.com/01mf02/jq-lang-spec/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
